title: Temple of Amun-Re meaning of hypostyle columns

content.prompt: The form of the columns in the hypostyle hall was intended to recall the

choices.label: dense clusters of papyrus reeds on the Nile
statuesque figures of the pharaoh and his family
palm trees that grow near desert oases
celestial rays that emanate from the crown of Amun-Re

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
